title: The Girl With the Cactus Handshake
description: Katrina Naomi was a joint winner of the 2008 Templar Poetry Pamphlet and Collection Competition with her pamphlet Lunch at the Elephant & Castle. She is originally from Margate and lives and writes in south London, where she has recently completed an MA in Creative and Life Writing at Goldsmiths.  The Girl with the Cactus Handshake is her first full collection and was shortlisted in the London New Poetry Awards in 2010.
author: Katrina Naomi
